meanings.definition: A compound containing multiple hydroxyl groups.

meanings.sent2: Food manufacturers use polyols as ingredients in various products.
meanings.sent3: The polyol walked into the lab and high-fived all the hydroxyl groups.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was like a polyol, with many different aspects bonding together.
meanings.sent5: The polyol molecule danced under the microscope, showing off its multiple hydroxyl groups.
